text: Inene abakholwa abo bathi: uAllâh nguMesiya, unyana kaMaryam, kodwa uMesiya (ngokwakhe) wathi: “Hini na Bantwana bakwaSirayeli! Nqulani uAllâh, iNkosi yam Oyinkosi yenu”. Inene lowo wayamanisa amahlulelane kuAllâh, uAllâh Umalele ukuba angene ePaladesi, ukanti ikhaya labo nguMlilo, kwaye kubenzi bobubi akuyi kubakho mncedi
